attributes.title: i was emotionally abused
attributes.review: I honest to god thought this was just going to be a normal app but when i had just tapped on the application to open it, i was horrified to see trumps voluptuous cheeks pop up on the screen??? i was..surprised to say the least, but as i swiped to try and push it away from my face in an attempt protect the innocence of my younger siblings, he crawled out of the screen and told my whole family to go back to where we came from ??? but we were in america? where he has CLAIMED to make it great again, i was confused, but i told our great president â€œthis is where we were born Mr.Donald Duck, we have no where else to goâ€ practically begging him to let us stay here. i handed him a bag of cheetos in an attempt to fix this relationship that we have built up, but he looked at me horrified and said â€œam i a joke to youâ€ i replied with â€œbut mr duck, dont leave, weâ€™- weâ€™ve been through so much together, ive had a child ğŸ™ˆ and hes yours ğŸ˜¢ğŸ–¤ please dont leave sirâ€ i break into a musical rendition of an award winning musical â€œhamiltonâ€â€™s song â€œSay No to Thisâ€ and it thankfully brings him back asking for more. little does he know im a MINOR the feds bust in they arrest him, he says to me â€œbut, miss, that was little duck jr who will be there for him?â€ and thats when i realized he was the worst father for little duck jr and i pulled out the app store and left this review. thank you for reading
